sentence.Network_en: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们俩都已经倦了，腻了，也死心了。

sentence.Network_en: I felt terribly jaded after working all weekend.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个周末工作之后我感到疲惫不堪。

sentence.Network_en: Here is a dish that will revive jaded palates.
sentence.Network_cn: 这道菜简直可以恢复迟钝的味觉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'disreputable'): from jade

encyclopedia.content: 专辑简介 最先是在《Spinefarm Metal DVD》这张盘上看到了TO/DIE/FOR的三首MTV，一上来就被《Hollow Heart》那特殊的吉他效果和男主音富有磁性的嗓音所吸引。主唱沉厚的声音与乐队电气化的乐器演奏融为一体，不可分割，好像少了其中任何一样都会让这乐队失色不少。于是，我开始上网寻求这个乐队的资料。令我吃惊的是，居然没有一个中文网站对此乐队做过介绍，无奈之下便去了他们的官方网站。TO/DIE/FOR是在90年代中期成立于芬兰的

entry.tran: 精疲力竭的；厌倦的；腻烦的；无兴致的
entry.def: If you are jaded, you feel bored, tired, and not enthusiastic, for example because you have had too much of the same thing.

example.ex: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
example.tran: 我们两个都已经觉得疲惫不堪，毫无兴趣，失望透顶。
他那种不胜其烦、玩世不恭的神态

sentences.sentence: "my father's words had left me jaded and depressed"- William Styron
